org.dhbw.geo.database

Class DBFence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBObject
      • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBFence

  • public class DBFence
extends DBObject
    A fence represents a specific geofence assigned to a fence condition. It consists of a location (latitude, longitude) and a radius.
    Author:
    Matthias

      • DBFence

        public DBFence()

      • DBFence

        public DBFence(long id,
               float latitude,
               float longitude,
               int radius)
        Creates a new fence. Use this to create fences fetched from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the fence
        latitude - the latitude of the fence location
        longitude - the longitude of the fence location
        radius - the radius of the fence

        Returns:
        an arraylist of the fetched fences
